item.title: Myosin V Collaboration receives Editors' Pick from JBC
item.description: In collaboration with the Yengo Lab (Penn State) and Thomas Lab (University of Minnesota) our paper “FRET and optical trapping reveal mechanisms of actin-activation of the power stroke and phosphate-release in myosin V” was accepted to the Journal of Biological Chemistry and was chosen to featured be as an Editors’ Pick for “providing an exceptional contribution to the field”. Read it here
